verses.verse: In you, <WH3068> Yahweh, I take refuge. <WH2620> Let me never <WH408> be disappointed. <WH954> Deliver <WH6403> me in your righteousness. <WH6666>
Bow down <WH5186> your ear <WH241> to me. <WH5337> Deliver me speedily. <WH4120> Be to me a strong <WH4581> rock, <WH6697> a house <WH1004> of defense <WH4686> to save me. <WH3467>
For you are my rock <WH5553> and my fortress, <WH4686> therefore for your name <WH8034>'s sake lead <WH5148> me and guide me. <WH5148>
Pluck me out <WH3318> of the net <WH7568> that <WH2098> they have laid secretly <WH2934> for me, <WH4581> for you are my stronghold.
Into your hand <WH3027> I commend <WH6485> my spirit. <WH7307> You redeem <WH6299> me, <WH3068> Yahweh, God <WH410> of truth. <WH571>
I hate <WH8130> those who regard <WH8104> lying <WH7723> vanities, <WH1892> but I trust <WH982> in Yahweh. <WH3068>
I will be glad <WH1523> and rejoice <WH8055> in your loving kindness, <WH2617> for you have seen <WH7200> my affliction. <WH6040> You have known <WH3045> my soul <WH5315> in adversities. <WH6869>
You have not shut me up <WH5462> into the hand <WH3027> of the enemy. <WH341> You have set <WH5975> my feet <WH7272> in a large place. <WH4800>
Have mercy <WH2603> on me, <WH3068> Yahweh, for I am in distress. <WH6887> My eye, <WH5869> my soul, <WH5315> and my body <WH990> waste <WH6244> away with grief. <WH3708>

For my life <WH2416> is spent <WH3615> with sorrow, <WH3015> my years <WH8141> with sighing. <WH585> My strength <WH3581> fails <WH3782> because of my iniquity. <WH5771> My bones <WH6106> are wasted away. <WH6244>

Because of all my adversaries <WH6887> I have become utterly contemptible <WH2781> to my neighbors, <WH7934> <WH3966> A fear <WH6343> to my acquaintances. <WH3045> Those who saw <WH7200> me on <WH2351> the street fled from me. <WH5074>
I am forgotten <WH7911> from their hearts <WH3820> like a dead man. <WH4191> I am like broken <WH6> pottery. <WH3627>

For I have heard <WH8085> the slander <WH1681> of many, <WH7227> terror <WH4032> on every side, <WH5439> while they conspire <WH3245> together <WH3162> against me, <WH2161> they plot to take away <WH3947> my life. <WH5315>
But I trust <WH982> in you, <WH3068> Yahweh. I said, <WH559> "You are my God. <WH430>"
My times <WH6256> are in your hand. <WH3027> Deliver <WH5337> me from the hand <WH3027> of my enemies, <WH341> and from those who persecute me. <WH7291>
Make your face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> on your servant. <WH5650> Save <WH3467> me in your loving kindness. <WH2617>
Let me not be disappointed, <WH954> Yahweh, <WH3068> for I have called <WH7121> on you. <WH7563> Let the wicked be disappointed. <WH954> Let them be silent <WH1826> in Sheol. <WH7585>
Let the lying <WH8267> lips <WH8193> be mute, <WH481> which speak <WH1696> against the righteous <WH6662> insolently, <WH6277> with pride <WH1346> and contempt. <WH937>

Oh how great <WH7227> is your goodness, <WH2898> which you have laid up <WH6845> for those who fear <WH3373> you, <WH6466> which you have worked for those who take refuge <WH2620> in you, <WH1121> before the sons of men! <WH120>

In the shelter <WH5643> of your presence <WH6440> you will hide <WH5641> them from the plotting <WH7407> of man. <WH376> You will keep them secretly <WH6845> in a dwelling <WH5521> away from the strife <WH7379> of tongues. <WH3956>
Praise <WH1288> be to Yahweh, <WH3068> for he has shown me his marvelous <WH6381> loving kindness <WH2617> in a strong <WH4692> city. <WH5892>

As for me, <WH559> I said in my haste, <WH2648> "I am cut off <WH1629> from before <WH5048> your eyes. <WH5869>" Nevertheless <WH403> you heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my petitions <WH8469> when I cried to you. <WH7768>

Oh love <WH157> Yahweh, <WH3068> all you his saints! <WH2623> Yahweh <WH3068> preserves <WH5341> the faithful, <WH539> and fully <WH3499> recompenses <WH7999> him who behaves <WH6213> arrogantly. <WH1346>
Be strong, <WH553> and let your heart <WH3824> take courage, <WH2388> all you who hope <WH3176> in Yahweh. <WH3068>
